name: 蔡舜宏
objective: 本課程將從最基礎的模糊集合觀念與數學原理開始介紹，其中包含數學運算，近似推理理論，解模糊方法之設計，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之數學模式等等，一直到進階的T-S模糊控制理論分析及其應用。課程內容包含理論介紹、程式撰寫及實際專題製作。
schedule:
1. Introduction to Fuzzy Set
2. Fuzzy Logic Control (FLC)
FI(Fuzzification Interface)，DML(Decision-Making Logic)，DFI(Deffuzzification Interface)
KB(Knowledge Base)，Membership function, etc.
3. Fuzzy Set Theory
1-1 Basic Operations: Complement, Union, Intersection, etc.
1-2 Further Operations: Fuzzy Complement, Fuzzy Union, Fuzzy Intersection, 
Averaging Operators, Fuzzy Relations, etc.
4. Pattern Recognition via Fuzzy Sets
4-1 Fuzzy Model for Pattern Recognition
4-2 Hard and Fuzzy c-Partitions
4-3 Hard and Fuzzy c-Means Algorithm
5. Fuzzy Implications
6. Integrated Fuzzy Logic Control
7. Self-organized Fuzzy Logic Control
8. Lyapunov Function Based Fuzzy Logic Controller
9. Introduction to Fuzzy T-S model
10. Advanced Fuzzy Controllers
11. Related Problem Discussions & Oral Presentation
scorePolicy: 期中考30%，小考20%，平時成績10%，期末報告40%
materials:
1. Li-Xin Wang, A Course in Fuzzy Systems and Control, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1997
2. John Yen, Reza Langari, Fuzzy Logic, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1999.
3. Fuzzy control system design and analysis, John Wiley and Sons, Inc. Tanaka, Kazuo, 2001
4. 上課講義
